hints.title: Unconditional LSI for Euclidean Gas (TARGET)
hints.content:
7406: :label: thm-unconditional-lsi
7407: 
7408: Under the foundational axioms:
7409: 1. Confining potential: $U(x) \to \infty$ as $|x| \to \infty$ with $\langle \nabla U, x \rangle \geq \alpha_U |x|^2$
7410: 2. Positive friction: $\gamma > 0$
7411: 3. Positive kinetic noise: $\sigma_v^2 > 0$
7412: 4. Bounded fitness: $|g(x, v, S)| \leq G_{\max}$
7413: 5. Sufficient cloning noise: $\delta^2 \geq \delta_{\min}^2$
7414: 
7415: **WITHOUT assuming**:
7416: - ❌ Convexity of $U(x)$
7417: - ❌ Log-concavity of $\pi_{\text{QSD}}$
7418: - ❌ Any smoothness of fitness landscape
7419: 
7420: The Euclidean Gas satisfies a Logarithmic Sobolev Inequality:
7421: 
7422: $$
7423: \text{Ent}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}(f^2) \leq C_{\text{LSI}} \cdot \mathbb{E}_{\pi_{\text{QSD}}}[|\nabla f|^2]
7424: $$
7425: 
7426: where:
7427: 
7428: $$
7429: C_{\text{LSI}} = \frac{C_0}{2\lambda_{\text{hypo}}} \cdot f(\tau, \lambda_{\text{clone}}, G_{\max})
7430: $$
7431: 
7432: with:
7433: - $\lambda_{\text{hypo}} = c \cdot \min(\gamma, \alpha_U/\sigma_v^2)$ is the hypocoercive rate
7434: - $\lambda_{\text{clone}}$ is the cloning rate
7435: - $f(\cdot)$ is a computable function (depends on proof method)
7436: - $C_0 = O(1)$ is a universal constant
